title: New: Hubbie Davison – Endless Rhythm (Demo)
body:
We wanted to introduce you to **Hubbie Davison** a little while ago, the Goldsmiths sound artist/house musician that very much pushed a few of our buttons when he posted his debut tracks to his soundcloud a few months ago.

Almost as soon as they went live, they were taken down again, with a stench that can only be traced to label interference. It seems that we’re back in business however, after a string of dates in London, he’s back with this playful little jam, _Endless Rhythm_.

His play.
